member.name: SYNCMGRHANDLERFLAGS
member.summary: Used in the structure as flags that apply to the current handler.

member.name: SYNCMGRHANDLERFLAGS.SYNCMGRHANDLER_HASPROPERTIES
member.summary: The current handler provides a property sheet dialog.

member.name: SYNCMGRHANDLERFLAGS.SYNCMGRHANDLER_MAYESTABLISHCONNECTION
member.summary: May call back the method. This value is ignored in Windows Vista and later.

member.name: SYNCMGRHANDLERFLAGS.SYNCMGRHANDLER_ALWAYSLISTHANDLER
member.summary: Indicates Show Handler in Choice even if items are not shown. This value is ignored in Windows Vista and later.

member.name: SYNCMGRHANDLERFLAGS.SYNCMGRHANDLER_HIDDEN
member.summary: Windows Vista and later. Do not display handler or item. This value is ignored by Windows Vista.
